info.name: ELIAN ► DOM Inspector
info.description: Style for DOM Inspector (with support FF Addon "DOM inspector Plus") Menus hasn't style. If you want menus i suggest try my style 104409 Scrollbars NOT included. (I'm waiting for permissons cuz they are a mod. Be patient.) You may also like: ► style 104407 ► style 104406
info.additionalInfo: (All appologies for my english) I hate light UIs. I REALLY HATE THEM. So here's my DOMI version. Att this moment it support the addon "DOM INSPECTOR PLUS" (Is the only addon for DOMI i'm using now). But there is not need to install, i mean, it works without it too. Things you should know: • TESTED in FF 28.0 and 31.0 (Locale-es and Locale-en) • Stylish version 1.4.3 • DOM Inspector version 2.0.14 • DOM Inspector Plus (Addon) version 2.0.15.1 • OS: Windows XP SP3 (Locale en) • There are some code that you could make better. (i'm a beginner, i'm try to learn.) • a comment? YES, please. Changelog: ► 2014-09-12: • Some changes in the menubar. • Some changes in headers on the DOM TREE panel. • Some changes in multiple line textbox (background and border). ► 2014-09-04: • Toolbars in one row. (Should be work on different localizations cuz they aren't fixed) • Changed main toolbar icon buttons. • I forgot stylize the URL popup. • Fixed the groupbox for the "Box Model Plus" panel (ADDON) ► 2014-09-04: ►►► FIRST RELEASE.
